# Skew Skew (shear) subsequent drawing operations. ## Basic Skew `draw canvas [ skew 20 0 box 0 0 100 100 ]` ## Parameters - **x-skew**: Horizontal skew angle in degrees - **y-skew**: Vertical skew angle in degrees ## Combined Skew `draw canvas [ skew 15 10 box 0 0 100 100 ]` ## See Also - [Transforms](/wiki/graphics/transforms/) - Transform overview - [Rotate](/wiki/graphics/transforms/rotate/) - Rotation transforms
